title: Leaver buster useless punished me
body: i was in a match and during the mid game i lagged, i stayed 5 minutes in base waiting for the stop of lagging and then i returned to play, i did 4 kills to and we won  the game, but the leaver buster punished me, you can take off my punshement??? (if i done some grammar error excuse my, i'm not english :)  )

replies.body:
Hey theloller012

Understand your frustration, but if you stay still for a period of time Leaverbuster will pick up inactivity. So even if you're trying not to lag and be respectful to your team you should still click around on and move on base. 

You also may wanna try Riot's connection KB if the lagging is happening a lot to you. It can help fix that issue if its a persistent one:https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so feel free to reach out to me. {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
